Subject: Video 
Software: Audition Premiere Pro 
Author: Scott Hirsch 

Video producers are adept at making all the visual aspects of their carefully shot projects look great. However, when it comes to the sound, many suffer unnecessarily. Audio for Video: Production and Post Sound Techniques is aimed at video professionals who are looking to manage their audio betterâ€”from start to finish. The course will take a three-point approach toâ€¨â€¨
	â€¢	Capturing audio and following the proper workflow for optimum results
	â€¢	Sound editingâ€”improving and restoring audio in post-production
	â€¢	Mixing and exporting audio or preparing it for handoff to a professional audio engineer


The second and third steps feature Adobe Audition CC, a powerful audio post-production program with a host of tools to clean up, sculpt, and finesse your sound design. The seamless workflow to and from Adobe Premiere Pro makes it a powerful audio toolset. However, author Scott Hirsch's techniques work equally well in other video and sound editing applications. Watch this course to learn practical techniques for getting better sound in all your productions.

Topics include:
	â€¢	Choosing the right gear, including lavalier and boom mics
	â€¢	Syncing offline devices
	â€¢	Working with audio in the video editor
	â€¢	Moving files to Audition
	â€¢	Choosing sources
	â€¢	Cleaning up and getting the most out of nonideal audio
	â€¢	Reducing noise
	â€¢	Adding sound effects
	â€¢	Mixing and adjusting levels
	â€¢	Exporting and managing final files
